channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Recently repaired patch breaking down again., 16th February
item.description:
Might be related to ref 5367882. Recently repaired patch breaking down again, with a growing pothole forming quickly. I think white paint may have been added, but that's now disappearing too. Also, this section of road seems prone to breaking down, and the repaired patch also does not endure long enough - should the road structure be investigated for any underlying problems ?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 323, Innsworth Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Might be ref 5502564 - still not fully repaired., 16th February
item.description:
Linked with Ref 5502564 ? Not sure if this job had been fully repaired or just had a coat of tarmac put over the hard edge that had been revealed, but the drop is still present, either because of a lower than normal drain and/or a pothole forming around it. Could it be re-checked please in case the first job had been closed off ? Thanks !
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two large potholes within approx 30-40yrds of each other, on the brow of the hill so difficult to avoid/see, 16th February
item.description:
On bridge OVER M5 (not on M5). One pothole in near the brow of the hill/bridge when heading towards Abbeymead. The other is within a few yards and just over the brow of the hill.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury

item.title: Blocked drains, 16th February
item.description:
Several blocked drains along this road, this is one example. Water filled and not draining despite no rain for last 24 hours. Some are completely blocked up with leaves etc.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shelburne Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain cover making awful noise as traffic goes over it, 16th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 103, Shurdington Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Small but deep pothole just before Brookfield Lane turn, 16th February
item.description:
